feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.7.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Skips healthcheck for agents  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3366 (cc77c)
  • Checks level with equal sign  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3368 (d529e)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fix link color when using colorized logs  -  by @Jeto143 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3357 (40935)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3363 (63be3)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3369 (7bf33)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.7.3
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes pagination when logs are very long packed together. see #3373  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3377 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3373 (d9996)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3376 (8408f)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3379 (f3cfe)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3382 (3487d)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.7.4
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Supports container rename  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3390 (c032f)
  • Show loader while opening event source  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3388 (197ab)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes broken minimum logs. see #3383  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3384 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3383 (48e50)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3391 (dcf26)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.8.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Enables swarm cluster to connect to external agents  -  by @amir20 and Mitch Brown in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3394 (1144b)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes log parser  -  by @pilat in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3398 (80d50)
  • Fixes log levels that have ansi color by stripping  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3400 (d4fa7)
  • deps: Update dependency @intlify/unplugin-vue-i18n to v6  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3399 (9a296)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.8.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Improves the loader for logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3404 (7ee26)
  • Adds show hostname and container name to dropdown in mutli log mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3406 (bd7f6)
  • Adds a short delay while waiting for logs to show  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3409 (c3f6f)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Improves condense view by expanding the tags  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3402 (7ccc3)
  • deps: Update dependency @iconify-json/material-symbols to ^1.2.7  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3403 (48426)
    View changes on GitHub
